message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $10,000?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make at least $13,500 to break even. Can you consider $13,000?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $11,500. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Bob, but I'm still not making enough to cover my costs. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $14,000 for the product. Can you consider $13,500?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, Alice, but I'm really close to my budget limit. I'm willing to go up to $12,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?
